thread.section_title: EG Chauffeurs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of EG Chauffeurs | egchauffeurs.com
thread.title: davis

author: davis
title: davis
text: Absolutely first class service from start to finish... would like to say a big thank-you to Rafik who was our driver for the day... we had to cut things short because of the weather and needed to be picked up earlier than expected, one phone call to Rafik and this was arranged instantly even though it was new years day it was not a problem.. so anyone who needs a chauffeur for their trip look no further as i highly recommend this firm... Thank you Rafik next time we are in London we will definitely be hiring your services again Mr & Mrs Davis
